columns.name: AUTH_BUNDLE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the authorization bundle record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FEATURE_FLAGS_C_NAME
columns.description: The feature flags for the ATB, helps determine if data is not set because it was null or because it wasn't implmented yet.
entries: Overrides for Subs, IDs, Addresses, Phones
